name: Wizard's Wrath
description:
Hello everyone! This game was made by @Krathya @mybs and @nodex0 for LD39 jam.

In this game you take the role of a wizard that is becoming old and needs a magic mana stone to survive. The stone, has been stolen by a dragon (as seen in the loading screen) and the player has to retrieve it before losing all his mana.

To achieve this the player has to beat 3 levels surviving the streets, where people corrupt your mana, and children souls regenerate it.

The controls are as follows:

  • Arrows to move
  • Space/Enter to accept or go to the next screen
  • 1 to use the lightning strike
  • 2 to use the speed boost

Hope you enjoy it!
